title: Sometimes I feel everything in this world is fake. I feel that this world is just an imagination of someone else or maybe a dream and we're just a character of someone else's dream or imagination. Will anyone help me to understand this world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Once there existed a saint named Zhuang Zhou. He was known for always being happy for no reason. But one day, he was sitting outside his home with a sad face. And people were wondering what had happened to him. A person came to him and asked what had happened? To which he replied that he was facing a problem that no one could solve. That problem had left him puzzled and no one seemed to have a solution to it. He said, “Last night, I was dreaming of hovering over flowers in a garden as a butterfly.” The person asked,”What is the problem in that?”. He said,”I was sleeping and in my dream I had become a butterfly. It could also be that the butterfly had gone to sleep and is dreaming that she had become me. My life could just be a dream of that butterfly. It’s possible. Now, I don’t know whether my dream is true or that of that butterfly? How do I solve this problem. It has put a question on my life, my reality. And no one seems to have an answer to it”. ~ An excerpt from Osho’s discourses.
Meditate a little every day. You can understand that yourself then. You are fortunate to have those feelings. You can benefit from the meditation programs of the Art of Living.
